ISS’s current public announcement system is a two-staged approach . you will hear two messages upon the trigger of the fire alarm .

fire Evacuation Upon hearing the second announcement on evacuation, staff and students are to follow the guidelines stated below: do: • Evacuate immediately. • Exit from the building using the nearest exit staircase – look out for this

fire Evacuation Primary assembly point - Carpark in front of I-Cube (I3) entrance In the event that the primary assembly point is not available, staff and students are to proceed immediately to the secondary assembly point.
